lines.text:
[watching the draft lottery on television]
Only men would come up with a draft lottery that uses balls.
That's not a boyfriend. That's a pen-pal!
How about right now? And then we'll see.

[posing as a blind man in line to register for classes]
Is this a full load?
In that case, I would like to take Photography 101.

Madame, I know I am blind! But I don't see why that should hold me back from taking the classes I want. Look at Beethoven, deaf as he was... did anybody tell him not to compose music? Look at Helen Keller... blind as a bat. Did anybody tell her not to teach? Or how about Van Gogh, just because he cut off his ear. No!

[breaking into an office with a suction cup on a window]
I saw it on "I Spy" or "The Untouchables". I forget which.
Huh! Egypt's not in Europe. That's only a technicality!
It's time to stop being angry, my friend.
